member.name: M:DigitalRune.Game.DataStore`1.IndexOf(`0)
member.summary: Gets the index of the given item.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the given item; or -1 if the data is not in the data store.

member.name: M:DigitalRune.Game.DataStore`1.IndexOfId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches for the index of the item with the given ID.

returns.para: The index of the specified item, if is found.
If is not found and is less than one or more IDs in the collection, a negative number which is the bitwise complement of the index of the first ID that is larger.
If is not found and is greater than any of the IDs in the collection, a negative number which is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last ID plus 1).
